channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Cartoon/Anime BattleDome
channel.description: I thought it would be fun if we did a Battledome section where people post threads in a certain format Ex: Place: in a gym Opponents: Naruto v Ichigo Restrictions: No jitsus, no spirit reaper. Just hand to hand combat Shippuden naruto vs Ichigo Don't answer its just an example. where people can state their opinion or give and take. I seen this through several forums. I thought this would be fun to do

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Cartoon/Anime BattleDome
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:7, topic:526837”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=645585.msg4342430#msg4342430 date=1375331353]
and you cant just have a thread for that because…?

Im pretty sure we had one for like gandalf vs dumbledore…

[/quote]
because its messy like that. Imagine, a person makes a battledome thread and says sasuke vs uryuu or something and then they debate. After a while
some kid joins in and says pikachu vs ganadorf. Mario vs luigi etc. it can get very hard then 10 irrelevant posts later. some guy gets on topic with sasuke vs uryuu[/quote]pretty sure having some ‘battledome’ section that is completely irrelevant to EVERYTHING else on this site would be about five thousand times worse… like honestly what the hell?

Read full topic

@chillwitm888 wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

I don’t get what this thread is for? Maybe that’s because I’ve never heard of a battledome before ;x. Someone care to explain?

Like, its like a dream battle between favorable tv show or comic characters. Like superman vs Goku Eg.
And battledome is for thread starters to start the requirements and people like you and me
discuss who would win and why.
